title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Award-Winning AI Revolutionizes Recruitment Industry
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: AQR’s ‘Hard to Believe’ Study Spurs Clash Over AI Use for Quants
description: Wall Street quants and leading financial academics are clashing over whether artificial intelligence has upended one of the core principles of systematic investing.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Wall Street quants and leading financial academics are clashing over whether artificial intelligence has upended one of the core principles of systematic investing.

title: Elon Musk Wants to Give You Money for Nothing
description: Artificial intelligence is the latest justification for supporting the bad idea of ‘universal basic income.’
content: A Journal report last week explained how tech titans, including Tesla’s Elon Musk and OpenAI’s Sam Altman, envision a “massive wealth-redistribution system” to placate worries over technology displacing human work. Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey and ... [4673 chars]

title: Is the A.I. Sell-off the Start of Something Bigger?

title: Rethinking hiring: AI as a partner in finding the right job and talent
description: By blending human and artificial intelligence, modern recruitment processes are becoming more efficient, data-driven, and inclusive, aiming for thoughtful hiring decisions.
content: Job seekers often experience a tense wait after submitting applications, hoping to be noticed by systems that may not fully understand or assess their potential. Recruiters, at the same time can be overwhelmed by the volume of resumes, tight deadline... [4212 chars]

title: Summer US IPO Thrills Set Stage for Crypto and AI-Led September
description: Companies touting their artificial intelligence and crypto-sector ties are speeding up their IPO timelines, after triple-digit first-day pops became a regular feature in this summer’s sizzling US market for new issues.

title: Global shares are mixed
description: Global shares were mostly lower on Wednesday, tracking a decline on Wall Street led by technology shares including Nvidia and other artificial-intelligence stars.

title: Is an AI winter upon us? There seems a chill in the air
description: The performance of OpenAI’s GPT-5, touted as a PhD level chatbot, left even diehard AI fans cold. Makers of artificial intelligence tools had better match AI hype with actual utility before disappointment worsens.
content: I wrote at the beginning of the year that Wall Street investors should brace for an ‘AI winter’ in 2025; not necessarily a slowdown in investment, and certainly not in hype from AI companies, but in tangible progress. Patience would be tested. Some r... [4692 chars]

title: Inspur Showcases at 2025 ASEAN AI Malaysia Summit
description: KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia, Aug. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- August 12-13, the 2025 ASEAN Artificial Intelligence Summit grandly opened at the Malaysia International Trade and Exhibition Centre (MITEC), with Inspur as an invited participant. Inspur showcased its AI-related technologies, products, solutions, and application scenarios at the summit's exhibition, facilitating strategic partnerships during the event.
